thread.title: Joanne
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Joanne

author: Joanne
title: Joanne
text: I ordered this wax jacket when it was on sale before Christmas. They went out of their way to make sure I got it in time for Christmas. It's a great jacket. True to size. The hood comes a bit too far down over my eyes but that's the only bad thing I gave to say.
